mapper.update: update refund set refundSum = #{refundsum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, refundDate = #{refunddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, refundExplain = #{refundexplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admitBuyid = #{admitbuyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, takesum = #{takesum,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where refundid = #{refundid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select refundid, refundSum, refundDate, refundExplain, admitBuyid, takesum from refund
